name: BURIED (ManuHerreraDev)
description:
ENGLISH

BURIED is a horror game prototype in which you must find the way to scape from the underground. Thanks to your flashlight, you will be able to explore a creepy bunker, but remember, you will be never alone...

This game prototype was developed entirely in just one week. I made this game in order to learn how to use a new game engine, Unreal Engine 5, so I can become more familiar with it.

ESPAÑOL

BURIED es un prototipo de juego de terror en el que debes encontrar la forma de escapar del subsuelo. De la mano de tu linterna, podrás explorar un siniestro bunker, pero recuerda, quizá no estás solo.

Este prototipo ha sido desarrollado en solo una semana. He hecho este juego con el objetivo de aprender como usar un nuevo motor para videojuegos, en este caso Unreal Engine 5.


CONTROLS

Movement - WASD

Jump - Espace

Crouch - C
